titleStmt.title: To Catholiko Stillingfleeton, or, An account given to a Catholick friend, of Dr. Stillingfleets late book against the Roman Church together with a short postil upon his text, in three letters / by I. V. C.
titleStmt.author: J. V. C. (John Vincent Canes), d. 1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to John Vincent Canes. cf. NUC pre-1956.
